DOC.criteria: 18 year old . Diagnosis openangle glaucoma ( without pseudoexfoliation pigment dispersion component ) ocular hypertension . Mean IOP eye le 18 mmHg screen visit . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Pregnant . History chronic recurrent severe inflammatory eye disease . Ocular trauma within past six month either eye .
